subject: [sugar] Field trial reports
body:
Hello all,

As we embark on the last stretch of core developement, I am wondering  
how the feedback from the initial trials will be evaluated and passed  
on. One issue arose lately when we realised that all the kids we have  
access to (in Canada) to test out apps have (some) previous  
experience with computers.

Is there to be application-specific feedback from the schools where  
the XOs have been tried?

This will be paramount in determining how we develop our  
instructional material in the months to come.

Best to all

jp

________________

http://jeanpiche.com
_______________________________________________
Sugar mailing list
Sugar@laptop.org
http://mailman.laptop.org/mailman/listinfo/sugar
